cmp: 门 (opening/door/gate/doorway/gateway/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy))
mng: intercalary, an extra day or month inserted into the lunar or solar calendar (such as February 29)

exm.mng: leap year, (lunar calendar) year with a thirteen intercalary month
intercalary month in the lunar calendar, leap month
Dragon King of the West Sea, Ao Run, also Ao Ji (敖吉)
